Name: Paws
About the game: Paws is a tale of two halves and sees you traverse a vast and harrowing landscape while fending off the threats that hunt you as you make your way home. Journey through the expanded world of Shelter 2 in the standalone adventure! About Paws : 'Dark and grime, twist through the vines, Slip through perils with finesse and toil. Be two for strength, be two of mind, Find the way home to familiar soil.' The game combines all the unique elements from the much loved Shelter series to present a lovingly crafted story about loss, friendship and a search for lost love. Main features: A gripping linear experience in a fantasy setting. For the first time ever in the Shelter world, you play as a young cub accompanied by a companion to help complete puzzles and overcome obstacles in the world. New game play features include the ability to follow tracks using your sense ability. A whole new corner of the world to explore with platforming game mechanics at its core. New original music from Retro Family.
